amazon-order-id.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon order.

merchant-order-id.description: The unique identifier for the merchant's order.

shipment-id.description: The unique identifier for the shipment.

shipment-item-id.description: The unique identifier for the shipment item.

amazon-order-item-id.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon order item.

merchant-order-item-id.description: The unique identifier for the merchant's order item.

purchase-date.description: The date when the purchase was made.

payments-date.description: The date when payments were made.

shipment-date.description: The date when the shipment is made.

reporting-date.description: The date when the report is generated.

buyer-email.description: The email address of the buyer.

buyer-phone-number.description: The phone number of the buyer.

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit of the product.

product-name.description: The name of the product in the shipment.

currency.description: The currency used for the transaction.

item-price.description: The price of the item in the shipment.

item-tax.description: The tax applied to the item's price.

shipping-price.description: The price of shipping for the shipment.

shipping-tax.description: The tax applied to the shipping.

gift-wrap-price.description: The price of gift wrapping for the shipment.

gift-wrap-tax.description: The tax applied to the gift wrapping.

ship-service-level.description: The service level of the shipping method.

recipient-name.description: The name of the recipient of the shipment.

ship-address-1.description: The first line of the shipping address.

ship-address-2.description: The second line of the shipping address.

ship-address-3.description: The third line of the shipping address.

ship-city.description: The city of the shipping address.

ship-state.description: The state of the shipping address.

ship-postal-code.description: The postal code of the shipping address.

ship-country.description: The country of the shipping address.

ship-phone-number.description: The phone number of the recipient for shipping.

bill-address-1.description: The first line of the billing address.

bill-address-2.description: The second line of the billing address.

bill-address-3.description: The third line of the billing address.

bill-city.description: The city of the billing address.

bill-state.description: The state of the billing address.

bill-postal-code.description: The postal code of the billing address.

bill-country.description: The country of the billing address.

item-promotion-discount.description: Any promotional discount applied to the item.

ship-promotion-discount.description: Any promotional discount applied to shipping.

carrier.description: The carrier responsible for shipping the item.

tracking-number.description: The tracking number for the shipment.

estimated-arrival-date.description: The estimated arrival date of the shipment.

fulfillment-center-id.description: The identifier of the fulfillment center.

fulfillment-channel.description: The channel through which the fulfillment is done.

sales-channel.description: The channel through which the sale is made.

dataEndTime.description: The end time for the data represented.
